title: White Wanderers
text: The White Wanderers are a [[Seren]] tribe founded by a [[white dragon]]. They are a nomadic tribe charged to protect a series of shrines. They believe in the power of knowledge and magic, and have a high percentage of literacy and dragonspeakers. Explorers and outsiders looking for Serens to deal with would do well to focus on this tribe. White Wanderers have a "cold" demeanor, and never let their emotions show.
